name: .HKI2 File Extension
summary: Learn about .HKI2 files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: An HKI2 file is a compressed archive created by WinHKI, an obscure archiving utility for Windows. It likely contains one or more programs or documents, which have been compressed and packaged together for easier storage and sharing. HKI2 files are similar to but compressed differently than .HKI1 and .HKI3 files.

content: WinHKI is an archive utility developed by Hanspeter Karl Imp. It allows users to compress and archive files in one of three different formats, each of which is optimized for different types of files. These formats are referred to as HKI1, HKI2, and HKI3. The HKI2 format is optimized for compressing programs and documents.

instructions: You can open an HKI2 file with WinHKI (Windows). However, WinHKI is discontinued and no longer available. Thus, if you do not already have access to WinHKI, you likely will not be able to open your HKI2 file.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
